sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE167420 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , CNBT_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CD , CONB_NM , YRS_MATE_CL_CD , DNT_CNTN , COPL_NM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD , CNBT_FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DNT_SCNT , USE_SUM_AMT , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT , CONB_SUM_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #cnbtSeilNum# , #conbCd# , #conbNm# , #yrsMateClCd# , #dntcntn# , #coplNm# , #bsnoEncCntn# , #cnbtRltClCd# , #cnbtFnm# , #resnoEncCntn# , #dntScnt# , #useSumAmt# , #ddcTrgtConbAmt# , #conbSumAmt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE167420 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , CNBT_SEIL_NUM=#cnbtSeilNum# , CONB_CD=#conbCd# , CONB_NM=#conbNm# , YRS_MATE_CL_CD=#yrsMateClCd# , DNT_CNTN=#dntcntn# , COPL_NM=#coplNm# , BSNO_ENC_CNTN=#bsnoEncCntn# , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD=#cnbtRltClCd# , CNBT_FNM=#cnbtFnm# , RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#resnoEncCntn# , DNT_SCNT=#dntScnt# , USE_SUM_AMT=#useSumAmt# , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT=#ddcTrgtConbAmt# , CONB_SUM_AMT=#conbSumAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND CNBT_SEIL_NUM=#cnbtSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE167420 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND CNBT_SEIL_NUM=#cnbtSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , CNBT_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CD , CONB_NM , YRS_MATE_CL_CD , DNT_CNTN , COPL_NM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD , CNBT_FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DNT_SCNT , USE_SUM_AMT , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT , CONB_SUM_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167420 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND CNBT_SEIL_NUM=#cnbtSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , CNBT_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CD , CONB_NM , YRS_MATE_CL_CD , DNT_CNTN , COPL_NM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD , CNBT_FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DNT_SCNT , USE_SUM_AMT , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT , CONB_SUM_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167420 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , CNBT_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE167420 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
